This is the bottom line does this sound alot better than any Who's Next cd you have?  I know it does because I've listened to probably every pressing and this one always comes in first.
Your right,it is a great version of this album,but it was not mastered by Steve Hoffman.
It was remastered by Hoffman, it was uncredited when he worked at MCA.  Check out his website and you'll see.
Also, keep in mind Steve's master is NOT used on any of the following versions: Germany Polydor, !"MCA gold"!, MCA/Polydor remix/remaster with bonus tracks, MFSL gold with bonus tracks.
